channel.title: How can I use BufferedReader/Writer to remove one line then write something new?
channel.description:
As the title says! :eek:
I am trying to make a custom expanded command. That needs several classes. I am just messing around in my class and hope for the best that it will work.. If you want to see the class.. I have to kill you first.. because it is a real mess..
Add me on skype.. name: addemod
EDIT: I can explain better.
When I do a command, etc. ::position I want it to write out the playername and the position the player is on. Then if the player does the command again, I want just HIS line to be removed then make a new line with his name.
Understand? :P

item.title: How can I use BufferedReader/Writer to remove one line then write something new?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“makersprivate123, post:1, topic:472977”]As the title says! :eek:

I am trying to make a custom expanded command.
That needs several classes.
I am just messing around in my class and hope for the best that it will work…
If you want to see the class… I have to kill you first… because it is a real mess…

Add me on skype… name: addemod

EDIT:
I can explain better.

When I do a command, etc. ::position
I want it to write out the playername and the position the player is on.
Then if the player does the command again, I want just HIS line to be removed then make a new line with his name.

Understand? :P[/quote]
Look into how the Reader/Writer works. Also, take a look at the ban commands…

Read full topic
